action.action-desc: Mr. Donovan (for himself, Miss Rice of New York, and Mr. King of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish the National Urban Security Technology Laboratory, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Research and Development for First Responders Act.

subsection.text: Title III of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating the second section 319 (relating to EMP and GMD mitigation research and development) as section 320; and
by inserting after section 320, as so redesignated, the following new section:

subsection.text: The Secretary, acting through the Under Secretary for Science and Technology, shall designate the laboratory described in subsection (b) as an additional laboratory pursuant to the authority under section 308(c)(2). Such laboratory shall be used to test and evaluate emerging technologies and conduct research and development to assist emergency response providers in preparing for, and protecting against, threats of terrorism.
The laboratory described in this subsection is the laboratory—

paragraph.text: known, as of the date of the enactment of this section, as the National Urban Security Technology Laboratory;
previously known as the Environmental Measurements Laboratory; and
transferred to the Department pursuant to section 303(1)(E).

subsection.text: The laboratory designated pursuant to subsection (a), shall—

paragraph.text: conduct tests, evaluations, and assessments of current and emerging technologies for emergency response providers;
conduct research and development on radiological and nuclear response and recovery;
act as a technical advisor to emergency response providers; and
carry out other such activities as the Secretary determines appropriate.

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 1(b) of such Act is amended by striking both items relating to section 319 and the item relating to section 318 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: 320. EMP and GMD mitigation research and development.
